resources.string: Press Scan Nearby to See if YOU are at Risk

string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Wash your hands frequently: Hum a little song for 30 seconds!
Maintain a Distance of 6 Feet at all times: This is Social Distancing
Wear a face mask: Don\'t have one? Use another sort of mouth cover.
Keep up to date on COVID-19 information
